lines.text:
[about his parents]
I'm sure they'll like you.
How? Rare, medium, or well done?
As much as I don't like to agree with the long neck, I'm afraid he's right.
I do'nt want to live with a bunch of three-horns. They're too bossy.
Petrie go...
[he's grasped onto a tree]
... but first, Petrie need help!
I will miss Cera, Littlefoot and Petrie.
Me no miss Ducky. Me no miss Spike neither.
Maybe I will not miss you either.
Me hope they find us before something else does.
Something else? Like what?
[they fall into a giant footprint]
Like whatever made this!
Spike, pay attention. You are supposed to be sad like the rest of us.
This is like waiting for your hatch day. It never seems to get any closer.
I do not mind finding food. I do not want to be food.
I am so hungry, my tummy is rumbling.
Me hear it.
That is not my tummy. That is an earthshake!

[as everyone's hiding under a rock from the sharp tooth]
I don't think he can reach us.

[the sharp tooth lifts the rock]
I do not agree.
My daughter is gone, and I blame that boy of your's!
Littlefoot? Why?
Because... I need someone to blame.
At least we're safe from the swimming sharp tooth.
Yeah, I'd much rather be eaten by the one that walks.
So, you like it here?
It's okay. There's not much food.
Till now!
He's a sharp tooth! We're not his family! We're his diet!
I don't think it's safe for you guys to be here. My dad can smell you.
Us smell bad?
No. He thinks you smell good.
That's even worser!
Ducky? Where'd she go?

[to Chomper]
You didn't have a mid-morning snack when we weren't watching, did you?
If you're gonna be seasick, please let Aunt Elsie know so she could duck?
So I was swimming along minding my own business when I saw this long neck on the beach.
That's my grandpa.
Is he now? So that's where you get your good looks!

[angrily, as the Giganotosaurus viciously strikes his mother]
You can't do that to my mommy!
I do not like swarming leaf gobblers. Oh, no, no, no.
Friends no fight. Petrie not like!

[as Petrie is covering his eyes]
Petrie, what are you doing up there?
Me try to stay as far away from big water as me can.
What did she tell you?
She told me not to play with my food.
